EmailTemplate.subject: EuroCIS 2022: Join NCR to see where retailing is headed
EmailTemplate.textOnly: What is on your wish list for 2022? With the added workload on store staff to keep stores safe and stocked and the pressure from increased customer expectations, the need to eliminate inefficiencies has never been higher. From POS to analytics to back office and beyond, we’ve made it easier than ever to integrate and simplify your operations so you can focus on your customers. We can help you meet your customers’ expectations for personalized shopping experiences and free resources to help you run your stores in a whole new way. Visit us on Stand 10/A04 at EuroCIS to discover new ways to: - Automate standard processes to free resources that help you grow - Introduce your own ecommerce and delivery services within weeks – and without expensive third-party providers. - Reap the benefits of virtualization in the store to improve performance and reduce costs - Delight shoppers when they’re inside the store with smarter self-service technologiesIt’s your chance to put our innovative retail technology to the test – and see how we can help run your store, today and tomorrow.
